item.title: Apple Watch shipments surge in India
item.description: Apple Watch shipments in India grew 141% in 2024, while the country's overall smartwatch market dipped 30% year-on-year. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights...

item.title: After a Violent Kidnapping, Crypto Elites Hire Bodyguards
